paragrafo1.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"AdKaora is first of all a company made up of people and then a digital agency, which is why it embraces the aggregative and inclusive Maori philosophy.\r\nThe work of a compact team made up of talents allows year after year to create innovative cutting-edge solutions and to achieve important goals.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

data.paragrafo2: Together we look forward to digital advertising future, together we are Digital Fighters.

roadmap.descrizione: AdKaora was born as mobile focused digital agency
AdKaora joins Banzai and widens the offer with branding solutions
AdKaora joins Mondadori Group and develops proximity marketing
AdKaora publishing network was born, a network with the best KPIs on the market
Proximity marketing turns into an advanced suite and Value Network welcomes new rich media formats, even in programmatic
AdKaora acquires Hej! and together are Mondadori's MarTech Hub. At the end of the year, AdKaora lands in Spain thanks to the union with AdGage

paragrafo.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"AdKaora, as part of Arnoldo Mondadori Editore S.p.A., has adopted a governance aligned with the best international standards, because we are convinced that this has the task of giving substance to the general principles that inspire our way of doing business:\r\ndiligence, fairness and loyalty.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"\r\nDiscover the governance system by downloading ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://adkaora.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/Codice-Etico-Gruppo-Mondadori.pdf"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"this pdf","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":".","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"AdKaora's most important value. A fabolous team for impossibile results.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"A challenging way of life , moving the focus forward to expand the look towards new worlds to explore","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Learning, dedication, know-how, determination and loyalty: to reach concrete goals all together.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Join the Digital Fighters! We are looking for enterprising, curious, passionate people who want to be part of a winning team.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}
